name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4 (FAN-MADE)
description:
This game was made as an homage to the old FNaF fan made games that attempted to predict the future, such as the next games' releases, for the series!

Game Created By: Scott Zimmerman (@ScottZimmerman)

Five Nights at Freddy's Created By: Scott Cawthon

Most assets are taken, credit for those to the original creators!

You play as a night security guard that must watch over the establishment "Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza". Turns out the animatronic mascot Freddy can... walk at night?

You sit in an office and only have 4 cameras to defend yourself. You must last from 12-6 AM to proceed to the next night.

This game was my first ever video game that I have made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5, and was also a test game to help me learn about the Clickteam Fusion 2.5 software. Please excuse any bugs or boring gameplay, since this essentially was only made to be a test game.

This game was made using Clickteam Fusion 2.5!
